"oh...." said Sinesis as he caught the energy of her eye lasers and stored =
that energy for later..... "autoguns, reconize the Mantis here and Dark Mou=
se as friends..." he said... "quickstrike is ove there...." he said, pointi=
ng at Quickstrike...he disappeared back into the catacombs of the Predacon =
base......
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 8:05 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


  *Mantella jumps to the side and rolls out of the way* Mantel=
la: I was looking for Quickstrike! *She says as she continues shooting eye =
lasers at Sinesis*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
   =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:53 PM
    Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Sinesis raises his arms and gets hit in the arm =
while protecting his face.... "same team as Dark Mouse? the traitor! comput=
er, fire upon dark Mouse when he arives!...." commands Sinesis.... "now you=
 will pay, worshipper of Hell Beast!..." he said, swooping behind Mantella =
and attempting to roll her up in a Schoolboy Pin for some more beating.....=
....
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
     =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:44 PM
      Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Mantella stares and frowns* Mantella: OOH=
HH!! THIS IS WHAT I GET FOR COMING TO JOIN UP IN THE SAME TEAM THAT DARK MO=
USE IS IN!!!!! *She says as she starts running while shooting her eye laser=
s at Sinesis*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
=
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:29 PM
=
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Sinesis is knocked down..he l=
aughs.... "nice one you are, but see how you go far.....ah! now i'm startin=
g to act like that rhyming bot! yuck!...." he said......he looked up at tth=
e autoguns.. "autoguns, target this one!..." he said, pointing to Mantella.=
....
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizard=
s 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7=
:17 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Mantella, Not see=
ing Senesis gets shot in the back. She climbs to her feet and begins shooti=
ng eye lasers at Sinesis*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
     From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: F=
riday, May 19, 2000 7:08 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


     =
       Sinesis heard someone ask for a job....Hell Beast troop...he thought=
...he walked back around, then popped out firing at Mantella full blast....=
.....
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilove=
alllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Frida=
y, May 19, 2000 6:53 PM
              Subject: Neo Beast Wars


           =
   *Mantella walks up to the Predacon base* Mantella: Hey, Let me in. I wan=
t a job!
